## CylinderCreationOptions interface

Creation options for cylinder shape

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface CylinderCreationOptions extends ShapeCreationOptions 
```
**Extends:** [ShapeCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./scene.shapecreationoptions.md)
